attrs.name: effect
attrs.desc: Default theme; The value of this attribute can be dark or light
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is dark.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: The default type is provided. The options for this attribute are normal, warning, error, information, and success. The priority of type is higher than that of effect.

attrs.name: content
attrs.desc: Displayed content. You can also use slot#content to transfer the content to the DOM.

attrs.name: append-to-body
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: placement
attrs.desc: Location where the tooltip appears; The optional value of this attribute is top/top-start/top-end/bottom/bottom-start/bottom-end/left/left-start/left-end/right/right-start/right-end
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is bottom.

attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: offset
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: transition
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is tiny-fade-in-linear.

attrs.name: visible-arrow
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the tooltip arrow. This parameter is a parameter in popper.js.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: popper-options
attrs.desc: Parameters of popper.js; The optional value of this property is a reference to the popper.js document
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is {boundariesCBG XUI: 'body', gpuAcceleration: false}

attrs.name: open-delay
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: manual
attrs.desc: Manual control mode. If this parameter is set to true, the mouseenter and mouseleave events do not take effect.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.desc: Indicated intelligent display mode; The value of this attribute can be auto or always
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is always.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the tooltip popper.

attrs.name: enterable
attrs.desc: Whether the mouse can go to the tooltip
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: hide-after
attrs.desc: Delay for automatically hiding the tooltip, in milliseconds. If the value is 0, the tooltip is not automatically hidden.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 0

attrs.name: tabindex
attrs.desc: Configure this element. The configured attributes will be automatically added to the trigger source of this component.
